title: Per capita consumption of chewing gum in selected countries worldwide 2009 to 2012
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Index value for 11 number of Countrys.
The Index value is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
The difference of Index value between the highest and lowest Country is 142.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index value in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Index value 152.0 is found at Country United States and the minimum is found at India where Country is 10.0.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Index value for 11 number of Countrys.
The Index value is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
The difference of Index value between the highest and lowest Country is 142.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Index value in each Country on the y axis.
The Index value is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country India.
The maximum Country United States has got 15.2 times higher Index value than the minimum Country India.
Index value at Country United States is 152.0 , second place is Austria at 114.0, and thirdly is Belgium at 112.0.
The Country United States has 1.77 times more Index value than average.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 943.0.
